title: Question about Randuins crit reduction.
body: Since the crit reduction isn't unique and went up from 10% to 20% in the patch, does this mean that building 5 Randuins will completely ignore any crit damage done so it's just regular autos? Just want to be sure about this.

replies.body: It actually is unique now.
